-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Does a set of code words form a uniquely decodable code?
--   
--   A Haskell-based write-up of Mark Jason Dominus' perl UDCode package.
@package udcode
@version 0.2.0.0


-- | UDCode: a naive Haskell implementation of Mark Jason Dominus'
--   uniquely-decodable code algorhythm, as described in
--   http:<i></i>blog.plover.com<i>CS</i>udcodes.html entry. For more
--   documentation, see the blog entry directly.
module Data.UDCode
is_udcode :: Eq a => [[a]] -> Bool
ud_pair :: Eq a => [[a]] -> Maybe ([[a]], [[a]])
